content.description: Summons capricious projectiles, Might interact with pickups.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Stone Mask** to make **Vicious Hunger**

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Speed +20% 
(3) Effect Duration +1.5s 
(4) Speed +20% 
(5) Projectiles +1 
(6) Effect Duration +1.5s 
(7) Speed +20% 
(8) Projectiles +1

fields.name: Pickups
fields.value:
<&Floor Chicken&> - Increases damage
<&Little Clover&> - Increases Cat Speed
<&NFT&> - Kills Cat
<&Orologion&> - Freezes Cat

fields.name: Luck
fields.value:
Luck affects the cats in several ways:
- It increases the chance for the cats to attack enemies.
- It decreases the chance for the cats to attack the player.
- It increases the chance for them to start a scuffle.
- It increases the chance of Pickups that aren't beneficial to the cats being used by the player instead.

content.title: Gatti Amari
